  1. """Views for the ``multilingual_events`` app."""
  2. from django.views.generic import DetailView, TemplateView
  3. from django.utils import timezone
  5. from simple_translation.middleware import filter_queryset_language
  7. from .models import Event
  10. class EventListView(TemplateView):
  11. """A view that lists all upcoming events for the current language."""
  12. template_name = 'multilingual_events/event_list.html'
  14. def get_context_data(self, **kwargs):
  15. ctx = super(EventListView, self).get_context_data(**kwargs)
  17. yesterday = timezone.now().date() - timezone.timedelta(1)
  19. qs = Event.objects.filter(is_published=True)
  20. qs = qs.filter(start_date__gte=yesterday)
  21. upcoming = filter_queryset_language(self.request, qs)
  23. qs = Event.objects.filter(is_published=True)
  24. qs = qs.filter(start_date__lt=yesterday)
  25. archived = filter_queryset_language(self.request, qs)
  26. return {
  27. 'upcoming_events': upcoming,
  28. 'archived_events': archived,
  29. }
  32. class EventDetailView(DetailView):
  33. """A view that displays detailed information about an event."""
  34. model = Event
